keyMappings:
# colemak vimium bindings matching my emacs config
# I also changed the link hint characters to be colemak-friendly:
# rastneiodhzxcv

unmap j
unmap n
map n scrollDown

unmap k
map e scrollUp

unmap l
unmap i
map i scrollRight

unmap zL
map zI scrollToRight

map u insert

unmap N
unmap K

unmap H

unmap L

unmap J

map s LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map S LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab action=hover

# using Vivaldi keybindings for these features
unmap o
unmap O
unmap b
unmap B
unmap r
unmap /
unmap x
# Old mappings
# map R reload hard
# map k performFind
# map K performBackwardsFind
# map L goForward
# map l goBack
# map E previousTab
# map N nextTab

# Map in Vivaldi:
# View - Address Bar: Ctrl+i
# Tab - New Tab: t
# Tab - Close Tab: x
# Tab - Previous Tab (by Order): E
# Tab - Next Tab (by Order): N
# Tab - Move Active Tab Backward: Ctrl+E
# Tab - Move Active Tab Forward: Ctrl+N
# Page - Focus Address Field: o
# Page - Reload Page: r
# Page - Force Page Reload: R
# Page - Find in Page: /
# Page - Find Next in Page: Ctrl+k
# Page - Find Previous in Page: Ctrl+K
# Page - History Back: l
# Page - History Forward: Ctrl+r
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
m: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
a: https://www.amazon.ca/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
